short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your new tab page back to basics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A new tab page for those who don't want a whole lot on their new tab page. Your new homepage is simple but customizable, keep it simple while making it yours.

• Change backgrounds, choose from our curated selection or upload your own image.
• Adjust the clock style with different fonts, colors and sizes.
• Add up to three time zones besides your current zone.
